satellite.heading: Satellite-mɔ̃ dzi
satellite.specs:
Eƒe didime: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube ƒe ƒuƒoƒo
Kpekpeme: 245 gr
Nusiwo wotsɔ wɔe: aluminum, sika, fiberglass, kple elektrɔnikmɔ̃wo ƒe akpa aɖewo.
Tsitretsitsi: Kɔkɔme 525 ± 25 km; eƒe ŋgɔgbedede: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Afɔdzidela: PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) si ISRO zãna

antenna.heading: Antenna/Kpememe
antenna.specs:
Dzidzeme: 6 m (kekeme) e 1.2m (kɔkɔme)
Kpekpeme: kilogram 46
Nusiwo wotsɔ wɔe: aluminum, epoxy ahuhɔ̃e board, sika aluminum dome si wotsɔ ƒo ɖe xɔtunu si wotsɔa xɔtunu wɔe me.

radio.heading: Radio dzi Nyatakakawo
radio.specs:
Dzesidede: 468.5 MHz
Trɔ asi le eŋu: CSS
Bandwidth: TBD ƒe didime
